faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about our community.

items.question: How can I join the free Discord community?
items.answer: Simply click on the Discord community link above and follow the instructions to join. Registration is completely free and takes just a few minutes.

items.question: What's the difference between free and paid community?
items.answer: The free community offers basic networking and experience sharing. The paid community provides personal consultations, access to premium tools, and exclusive content.

items.question: Can I cancel premium membership anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel premium membership anytime without notice period. Access to premium content remains active until the end of the paid period.

items.question: Are communities suitable for AI beginners?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our communities are designed for all knowledge levels - from complete beginners to advanced AI experts. You'll find support at every level.
